attributes.description:
Conquer the journey in a symphony of moments with the all-new, all-conquering, Haval H6. It offers a clean, contemporary design Influenced by bold architecture and mastered by modern engineering, the Haval H6 is a vehicle that embodies intelligent thinking. The Haval H6 features a powerful yet eco-friendly 2.0L Turbo charged engine producing 150kw and 320Nm at 6000 â€“ r/min.
Highly spec features include:
-	Electronic Parking Brake
-	Auto Hold
-	Smart Start-stop
-	Tillt & Telescopic Steering
-	Driving & Terrain Modes (Standard, Eco, Sports, Snow, Sand, Offroad)
-	Torque on Demand AWD System
-	Dynamic Steering Modes (Sport, Comfort, Light)
-	Speed sensitive Electric Power Steering
-	Cruise Control
-	18 Inch Alloy Wheels
-	Panoramic Sunroof
-	Roof Rails
-	Rain-sensing wipers
-	Leather Steering Wheel
-	Keyless entry & Push button start
-	Paddle Shift
-	Front 12V power outlet
-	10.25-inch Colour Combination Instrument
-	Leather seats
-	Driver seat Electric adjust: 6 directions
-	60:40 split folding rear seats
-	6 Airbags: Dual + Side + Curtain
-	Child Safety lock & Isofix
-	Electronic Stability System (ESC) + Traction Control (TCS)
-	Anti-Roll System (RMI) + Secondary Collision Mitigation (SCM)
-	Cornering Brake Control & Brake Assist
-	Hill Decent & Uphill Assist
-	Tyre pressure monitoring system (TPMS)
-	Front Parking Sensors
-	Rear Parking Sensors
-	360 Degree panoramic Camera
-	Adaptive Cruise, Traffic Jam assist and Intelligent Turning Assist
-	Pre-collision warning, Automatic emergency braking
-	Lane Departure Alert, Lane Keeping Assist and Lane Centre Keeping
-	Traffic sign recognition
-	Driver Fatigue Alert
-	12.3-inch multimedia touch display
-	Bluetooth Connectivity
-	Speed Sensitive Volume Control
-	Carplay & Android Auto
-	LED headlights & Taillamps
-	Automatic headlights + Follow Me Home
-	Front Fog LED
-	Daytime running lamps
-	Dual Zone Auto Aircon with Rear aircon duct
-	Standard with 5yr/100 000Km Warranty and 5yr/60 000Km Service Plan
attributes.title: 2022 Haval H6 2.0T Luxury 4X4 Auto

attributes.description:
Is the Peugeot 1.2 engine any good?
It's a fun and infectious little fizzer of a powerplant, not particularly quick but always up for a bit of sport. This is a small car that is priced well, looks good and is even respectably practical. Ongoing running costs are tiny and equipment levels are good
